# 𒅥 gu7 ⇔ 𒂵 ga

𒅥 KU2 = KA 𒅗 x 𒃻 GAR = eat (kau.grass)
𒅥 KU2 ⋍ খা kha (eat)
𒅥 akālu 𒀀𒅗𒇻 a-ka-lu 𒌑𒅥 u₂gu₇ אֹכֶל אוכל 'ókhel كل kal אכל eat / food ⇔ calories
𒅥 KAᴺ x GAR > खाणे khāṇe yantar, xintar (eat) < खादति khā́dati k'eat(do)
𒅥𒅇𒁉 gu7-u3-bi eating

𒅗 KA KIR₄ KU₂ GU₃ ZU₂ 𒌑𒅥 u₂gu₇ (Kuh)Acker acre

𒅗 KA kǒu 口 'Kieme'

al Tirigu 𓅂 alti rigu 𓅱 altirigu "wren" #diqdiqqu
𒀠𒋾𒌷𒅥𒄷 al-ti-ri2-gu7 mušen
𒀠𒋾𒌷𒄖𒄷 al-ti-ri2-gu mušen
𒀠𒋻𒅥𒄷 al-tar-gu7 mušen
𒀠𒉈𒌷𒂵𒄷 al-de3-ri2-ga mušen
𒀭𒋾𒌷𒅥𒄷 an-ti-ri2-gu7 mušen

אכל oćel <> ուտել utel eat
